definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
erhua variant of 坎肩[kan3 jian1]

sentences.english: We want to buy Scarves, Stoles, Pareos and Made-Ups, Shawls.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购围巾，女用坎肩，海滩裙和装扮，披肩。

sentences.english: Her sleeveless jacket is made of soft sheepskin and is very warm.
sentences.chinese: 她这个坎肩是软羊皮的，特别暖和。

sentences.english: The Tajik people wear sleeveless jackets, log skirts and riding boots.
sentences.chinese: 塔吉克人喜穿坎肩，长裙，马靴。

sentences.english: He wore a scarlet waistcoat, and indulged in the sort of words which break everything.
sentences.chinese: 他穿了一件鲜红的坎肩，说话全没忌讳。

sentences.english: Women like to wear women's flag mounted and foot long flag mounted, waistcoat or jacket.
sentences.chinese: 女子喜穿长及脚面的旗装，或外罩坎肩。

sentences.english: The frayed cashmere sweaters can be changed into fashionable cashmere waistcoats.
sentences.chinese: 磨破的羊绒衫可以改成时尚的一羊绒坎肩。

sentences.english: It was imaginative waistcoat with exceedingly fanciful glass buttons.
sentences.chinese: 花哨的坎肩上配搭着一些光怪陆离的玻璃钮扣。

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
